name: The Adventures Of Space Martin
description:
THIS IS JUST A DEMO LEVEL! Only a fraction of the potential this game has. (made in my first month of game development ever! oct 2021)

Martin was a regular boy like any other with his head in the clouds (or space in this case). Always daydreaming about his Secrete identity as "Space Martin" Kid Astronaut. The Adventures Of Space Martin are simple. Collect enough Space Eth to fill up his tank to get back to earth. But simple as they are there are evil robots who want to stop our friend  from reaching his ship as well as obstacles he must avoid to make it back alive. He needs your help to get back to earth in time for the school bus!

Join Martin on his next Adventure Now!
